comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: From what I've read and understood, your company offers whitepaper creation services (please correct me if I'm wrong).I have some doubts:Are there any other services besides this one? What is the use of your currency? Can it be used to pay for services, for example?I would like to read your whitepaper, when will it be available?Sorry for so many questions but I think it's important for other people who read this thread as well.
